longBusinessSummary: Lincoln Pharmaceuticals Limited engages in manufacturing and trading of pharmaceutical products in India. The company offers products in the areas of anticold, antibiotic, otolaryngology, pain management, gastro, anti-malarial, anti-fungal, corticosteroids and cosmo-derma, anti-diabetic, anti-hypertensive, gynecology, cardio and CNS, respiratory system, and dyslipidemic; and branded generics. It also exports its products to approximately 60 countries, including Europe, Canada, Latin and North America, Africa, the Asia Pacific, and South East Asia. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
